com.brogrammers.agora.helper

Class QuestionLoaderSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brogrammers.agora.helper.QuestionLoaderSaver

  • public class QuestionLoaderSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class, responsible for the serialization of cached Question objects. Questions are serialized as JSON strings saved in a SharedPreferences file. The CacheDataManager uses it to persist its cache.
    Author:
    Group02
